thread.title: First Day of New York Comic-Con 2015 (PHOTOS)
thread.title_full: First Day of New York Comic-Con 2015 (PHOTOS)

author: Aristide Economopoulos | NJ Advance Media, for NJ.com
title: First Day of New York Comic-Con 2015 (PHOTOS)
text:
Comments 
NEW YORK - Thursday was the first day of the New York Comic-Con 2015 which runs through Sunday. Celebrating its 10th year, there has been such a big demand that in addition to the show at the Javits Center, it has expanded to utilize the nearby Hammerstein Ballroom to highlight TV programing by a number of networks. 
The show is expected to draw in more than 150,000 fans with having nearly 1,000 exhibitors. There will be panel discussions, signings, merchandise for sale plus meet-and-greets with actors, authors and artists with their fans. 
This year there are a couple of panels that have a buzz around them already. More space has been alloted to host panels on The Walking Dead, a revival of The X-Files after a 13 year hiatus and a panel for Batman fans on the 30th Anniversary of DC Comics The Dark Knight Returns,' among others. 
Although tickets for the four-day event are already sold out, fans can watch the New York Comic-Con 2015 live stream at the NYCC website . 
Aristide Economopoulos can be reached at aeconomopoulos@njadvancemedia.com and you can follow him on Twitter at @AristideNJAM and Instagram Find NJ .com on Facebook
